name: Save Charlie Hebdo with your Eraser
name_original: Save Charlie Hebdo with your Eraser
description:
It is a game I made for the CharlieJam to commemorate the killings that happened the 7th of January 2015 in Paris.

It is very simple to use : Just hold the left button of the mouse to make the eraser work and erase all the bullets you can !

Enjoy !

Quentin Kerguélen
